channel.title: Daily Express :: World Feed
channel.description: Simply The Best 7 Days A Week

item.title: Magnitude 5.6 Peru earthquake leaves one man killed by landslide with several injured
item.description: One man has died and at least five people have been injured after a 5.6 magnitude earthquake struck off the coast of Peru, authorities have confirmed
item.author: Paige Ingram,Michael D. Carroll
item.media:keywords: Earthquakes, Ring of Fire, Peru, Peru earthquake, Lima, landslide

media:content.media:description: Dust billows out of a landslide during an earthquake in Lima on June 15, 2025. A magnitude 6.1 earthquake that shook Lima and its surrounding areas caused one death in Peru's capital and several landslides. (Photo by Alejandra IPINCE / AFP) (Photo by ALEJANDRA IPINCE/AFP via Getty Images)

media:thumbnail.media:description: Dust billows out of a landslide during an earthquake in Lima on June 15, 2025. A magnitude 6.1 earthquake that shook Lima and its surrounding areas caused one death in Peru's capital and several landslides. (Photo by Alejandra IPINCE / AFP) (Photo by ALEJANDRA IPINCE/AFP via Getty Images)

item.title: Iran-Israel LIVE: Netanyahu says Israel has destroyed Iran's main nuclear site
item.description: Israel and Iran continue to attack each other as death tolls mount with little sign of the conflict de-escalating.
item.author: Charlotte Becquart,Jon King,Ciaran McGrath,William Morgan
item.media:keywords: Iran-Israel conflict, Iran, Israel, World War 3, strikes, Israel-Iran conflict, missile strike, child casualties, WW3 fears

media:content.media:description: Israel, led by Benjamin Netanyahu, also hit an airport in Mashhad on Sunday

item.title: Horror as Russian soldier beats comrade in violent assault as army morale cracks
item.description: DISTRESSING IMAGES: Four soldiers from Russia's 150th Motor Rifle Division were sent on a mission near Toretsk.
item.author: John Varga
item.media:keywords: Russia, Ukraine, Vladimir Putin, Russian army, Ukraine 82nd Air Assault Brigade, Kremlin, Toretsk, Donetsk

item.title: Netanyahu claims Iran 'wants to kill' Trump in explosive interview
item.description: Israel's Prime Minister described himself as Mr Trump's "junior partner" in confronting Iran's nuclear programme.

item.media:keywords: Donald Trump, Iran, Nuclear weapons, Benjamin Netanyahu, Nuclear Threat

item.title: Trump mocked over troop marching detail at birthday parade - but not everyone agrees
item.description: Trump told reporters that the military show was going to be a "big day" and said "we want to show off a little bit."

item.title: Iran on the brink of collapse as political leadership flees Islamic regime
item.description: The Israeli Prime Minister urged ordinary Iranians to seize the moment and overthrow Khamenei and his clerics.
item.author: John Varga
item.media:keywords: Israel, Iran, Benjamin Netanyahu, Ali Khamenei, Ali Asghar Hejazi, Russia, Tehran, Middle East, Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps, Nuclear Weapons

item.title: Macron takes 10-word swipe at Trump as he arrives in Greenland
item.description: The visit precedes a G7 summit in Canada, where Mr Macron is expected to again confront Mr Trump over climate and Arctic sovereignty.
item.author: Ciaran McGrath
item.media:keywords: Emmanuel Macron, Greenland, Donald Trump, Macron, Trump, Arctic sovereignty

item.title: Real reason Israel had to launch pre-emptive strike against Iran
item.description: If you think Israel and Iran are "trading blows" you've misunderstood the situation in the Middle East.
item.author: Col Richard Kemp in Israel
item.media:keywords: Defence, Iran, Israel, Nuclear weapons, pre-emptive strike, nuclear weapons

item.title: Russia sparks WW3 panic as Putin's army prepares invasion on Nato country's neighbour
item.description: The military display involved tanks, artillery, and military vehicles, which simulated the Soviet breakthrough against Axis forces that ultimately opened the Balkans to Soviet control.
item.author: John Varga
item.media:keywords: Russia, NATO, Putin, Transnistria, Romania, Moldova, World War 3, Kremlin

item.title: Anti-tourist protests turn ugly in Spain holiday hotspot
item.description: The demonstrators had surrounded the hotel and were holding placards claiming tourism was pricing them out of housing and robbing them of their futures.
item.author: Natalia Penza,John Varga
item.media:keywords: Spain, Overtourism, Barcelona, Spain anti tourism protests, Palma, Majorca, Travel, Menys Turisme, Més Vida
